text: Dyan Cannon (born Samille Diane Friesen; January 4, 1937) is an American actress, director, screenwriter, editor, and producer. She was known for her role as Alice in Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice. ==Other websites== * * * Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Saturn Award winners Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Actors from Tacoma, Washington Category:Writers from Tacoma, Washington
title: Dyan Cannon
